title: Bug 18163 - Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: The 'Add Import' feature is not working correctly due to leading/trailing whitespace in the selection.
OB: When I use 'Ctrl+M' to perform 'Add Import,' nothing happens because there is trailing whitespace within the selection.
EB: The 'Add Import' feature should work as expected, recognizing 'Node' instead of 'Node ' since I made my selection by using 'Shift + Ctrl + Right' to ensure no extra spaces.
SR:
1. Open the code editor.
2. Select the word 'Node' with 'Shift + Ctrl + Right,' including any trailing whitespace.
3. Use the 'Ctrl+M' shortcut to add an import. Observe that nothing happens, indicating the issue with trailing whitespace.
